all.title: App version outdated
all.message: Please update to the latest version of the SODA by using our autoupdate feature or download from here.

win32.title: Welcome to version 9.1.0 for Windows!
win32.message:
New features have been added!
  • Guided mode now has the ability to edit auto-generated manifest files in a spreadsheet like UI
  • In Freeform mode, Create manifest.xlsx you can preview manifests locally before uploading.
  • You can now add datasets to collections in Freeform Mode to organize datasets.
  • Banner images that exceed a dimension of 2048 x 2048 will be scaled down for upload.
  • inputs and outputs metadata have been replaced with code_parameters as per the SDS 2.0
